title: Hormel Real Bacon Crumble Topping, 4.3 Oz Pouch
features: Includes twelve 4.3 ounce packages of HORMEL Real Crumbled Bacon Topping
With the resealable pouch, you can add as much bacon as you want to your favorite dishes for a savory flavor punch without the mess of frying bacon
With 40 percent less fat than USDA suggests for pan-fried bacon, you get delicious bacon without sacrificing flavor.
This fully cooked, 100% real crumbled bacon is the perfect addition to your favorite dishes like salads, soups, eggs, mac & cheese, potatoes, and casseroles
All HORMEL bacon topping varieties are shelf stable until opened
description: HORMEL Real Crumbled Bacon adds flavor to all your bacon-inspired dishes. Want the convenience of bacon flavor without the mess of cooking raw bacon? Our real crumbled bacon comes in an easy resealable pouch so you can sprinkle some on your sour cream topped baked potato or try it on your favorite egg dish! HORMEL Real Crumbled Bacon contains 40 percent less fat than USDA data suggests for pan-fried bacon, giving you less fat without ditching flavor. It's strikingly handsome on all your favorite dishes, like baked potatoes, salads, pizza, omelets, and more. For over 100 years, our cuts of bacon have always been cutting edge. That's the HORMEL brand difference your taste buds will appreciate. All trademarks, logos and images are owned by Hormel Foods Corporation, its subsidiaries and affiliates. Copyright Hormel Foods, LLC.
